item.title: Obsidian Introduction
item.description: ðŸš€ My Personal Productivity System For some time now, I’ve been using what’s now known as journaling. It’s always been a form of personal catharsis for me, where I document my emotions, concerns, and feelings. However, lately, it has evolved, thanks to tools like Obsidian, into what many might call a “second brain.” Even before, Obsidian was defined as such, a tool for your second brain. Though I’m not fond of the term, it’s a fact that it’s an extremely powerful tool.
